bodyV2.markdown:
Wherever possible, we would be happy to look into an exchange to another date of the same show at the same venue. However, please note that as LOVEtheatre is a third-party ticketing agency, all exchanges as subject to availability and the venue’s own terms and conditions, which can be found on the venue’s website. 

Our dedicated LOVEtheatre team would be happy to advise whether an exchange is possible, and if so, check the current availability for the best seats. Simply Submit a request via our Help Centre and provide up to 3 potential dates you would like to exchange your booking to. 

Please note that not all theatres allow exchanges.
